insurancemodel

Class CarPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • insurancemodel.Policy
      • insurancemodel.CarPolicy

  • public class CarPolicy
extends Policy
    This is class to create and control all vehicle insurance policies. It contains details of the estimated value of the vehicle being insured, the age of the driver, the number of years in which there has been no claims on the insurance and if the policy is fully comprehensive or not.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class insurancemodel.Policy

    • Constructor Detail

      • CarPolicy

        public CarPolicy(int policyYear,
                 java.lang.String policyNo,
                 double newCarValue,
                 int newDriverAge,
                 int newNoClaimYears,
                 boolean newComprehensive)
          throws IllegalPolicyException
        Constructor for the CarPolicy class. Takes variables that are inherited from the Policy class and that are parsed in from the InputData class.
        Parameters:
        policyYear - inherited int variable from Policy.java that is the year of issue for this policy
        policyNo - inherited String variable from Policy.java that is the unique number of this policy
        newCarValue - the current value that the vehicle is valued at for this CarPolicy object
        newDriverAge - the age of the driver for this CarPolicy object.
        newNoClaimYears - the number of years there has been no claims on this policy
        newComprehensive - true if it is comprehensive, false if is not comprehensive for this CarPolicy object.
        Throws:
        IllegalPolicyException - Catches if the policyNo or policyYear are out-width their boundaries.
